title: Drawing, "Mount Chimborazo, View from Riobamba, Ecuador", July 1857
medium: Graphite, brush and oxidized white gouache on buff-colored wove paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at upper left:  over [with an arrow]; again, twice at lower left: yerba; and again, at lower right: Chimborazo from Riobamba.
description: Horizontal view of the valley in the left foreground and middleground with Mount Chimborazo in the left background and a second peak in the right background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Mount Chimborazo, View from Riobamba, Ecuador", July 1857.
July 1857. Graphite, brush and oxidized white gouache on buff-colored wove paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-109.
